entry.title: Procedure for non-tech contributions
entry.summary: In an email dated March 3, 2014, Tom Geller asks for suggestions on how to add a file to a particular solution. A response was given by Wladimir with a possible solution. The solution involves editing the file in the 0.9 branch rather than the master branch and can be done by going to the release notes page on Github, clicking "edit", making changes, and adding a commit message.
